name: Reaching Out (txa7348)
description:
Talk to your neighbors through their doors to find out what they need help with. Interact with objects in the town to pick them up and bring them to your neighbors.

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact, Talk, Pick up

Mouse: Navigate Menus, Pick Dialogue Options

Developers:

TJ Driscoll

Jordan Hemmers

Zach Wilson

Seth Arnold

Artists:

Triton Adamski

Matthew Anniballi

Joel White

Composers:

Jeremy Miller

Richard Simchik
